attributes.action: Help for the homeless in belfast! Open old building's for shelter.
attributes.additional_details: We need to come together as community and stand up and speak for the homeless.
attributes.background: To many people are sleeping on the streets of Belfast City on these freezing cold days and night's. Something has to be done before more loose their lives. Mabey open old building's for shelter for them. It just is not fair that this is happening in 2016. If we all come together we can make a change
